entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Snap Ownership Transfer from Microsoft to Canonical #304

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: New attribute for interop-specific struct concerns #100896
  • HttpClient - control of ImpersonationLevel lost by deprecation of HttpWebRequest #100895
  • WhenAll().Wait() does not honor cancelation token #100894
  • [wasm] Follow-up work for #100802 #100893
  • Signed byte is incorrectly transferred over interop on iOS/Catalyst ARM64 #100891
    9.0.0
  • PhysicalFilesWatcher: Log file/path triggering a change notification #100872
  • Support specifying rundown keyword in EventPipe #100871
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(string) and similar methods should return the item/string #100870
  • [API Proposal]: New AssemblyName-like type for TypeName parsing #100867
  • [wasi] Native link produces `dotnet.wasm` in project folder and then it copies it to output folder #100863
    9.0.0
  • Cannot compile native AoT ASP.NET Core application with latest .NET 9 daily build #100862
  • mono/mini/interp/interp.c crash in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests #100850

Closed

  • Is there any other way to generate native dlls without publishing? #100865
  • System.Text Exception cannot be caught in NativeAOT when Reflection is disabled, but is solved with a Console.WriteLine() #100888
  • Non-blittable struct with explicit layout has wrong managed size #100220
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in SslStream #37915
    9.0.0
  • Iterating over a ROS<byte> generates a bunch of NOPs in Release #100875
  • [wasm][debugger] Chrome test failure `DebuggerTests.SteppingTests.SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` #98215
    9.0.0
  • WASM CI failure in `DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.InheritedAndPrivateMembersInAClass` #75013
    9.0.0
  • Test failure with "Provider could not perform the action since the context was acquired as silent" #29419
    9.0.0
  • Using WinTrustVerify without certificates installed #100864
  • REG_SECRET_STUB_PARAM restore from stack #100301
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Utf8JsonReader.ValueTextEquals(ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Text, bool propertyNameCaseInsensitive) Overload #100856
  • ConcurrentDictionary Count is slow #100853
  • JsonStringEnumConverter always returns a default value #100852
  • Runtime crashing on startup on emulated x64-on-ARM64 Windows #100425
  • .NET 8 RC1: NativeAOT fails to build for linux-bionic-arm64 when specifying project as library (Linker error) #92272
    9.0.0
  • [Bug] GenerateReferenceAssemblySource drops constraint #100843
  • Incosistent Indentation of List Patterns in Switch Expressions #100806
  • Could not load file or assembly \bin\Debug\net8.0\atlas.clinicmanagement.exe'. Format of the executable (.exe) or library (.dll) is invalid.' #98868
  • Linq generation issue #100827

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new line to be specified for JSON formatting #100890
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use wix 3.14.1-8722.20240403.1 #100889
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [scouting] Reenable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes #100882
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58" #100877
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix missing hash calc from #100847 #100876
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: verify full profile consistency after importation #100869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] ASAN experiment #100866
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix condition in Debug.Assert in TarEntry.cs #100860
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Delete workaround for C++ compiler bug #100859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't emit analyzer warnings for MakeGeneric understood by ILC #100858
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Allow debuggers to see first chance exceptions #100854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reimplement a few helpers with new RuntimeHelpers APIs #100846
    area-System.Runtime

Merged

  • Disable COM descriptor support when trimming #100881
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Don't probe for aot modules unless we were built for AOT #100802
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make src/native/managed projects use Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler version from Version.props #100845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update CI builds to not use VS Previews #100622
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_type_dup_with_cmods #100849
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Import pool providers #100851
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm][debugger] Cleaning CI #100868
    area-Debugger-mono
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Pre-compute and cache class name hashes #100847
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] unhandled exceptions #100855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable passing through special LLVM build modes from VMR outer build #100822
    area-Build-mono
  • Add Log to SendStreamLimit Http3 Test #100857
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in Release builds #100665
    area-System.Net
  • Remove _init and _fini exports from NAOT and update android docs #100755
    os-android, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #100832
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Adds back Enum constraint to Enum.GetNames<TEnum>() #100844
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix mismatched buffer element type #100779
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] with emscripten ASSERTIONS #100767
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100795
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100794
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100793
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [browser] chrome crash testing #100702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [Release/8.0] Remove preventing EH at shutdown #100836
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Disable range check overflow check #100820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100734
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100818
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Do not merge: Remove hardcoded list of compiler versions in init-comp… #100761
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trying to build a statically linked binary, getting link error #40097
  • GenAPI fails to generate source for latest Corelib #40090

Closed

  • PublishReadyToRun=true removes digital signature from some .dlls #14438

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #40118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add RuntimeHostConfigurationOption for COM descriptor support #40106
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Fixed a reference to the supported .editorconfig options. #40095
    untriaged

Merged

  • Set dotnet-watch timeout based on XUnitWorkItemTimeout #40028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2426469 #40043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: "Permit surrogate pairs and wide Unicode-escaped code points in identifiers" #1742
    Any Time
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Relax `Add` requirement for collection expression conversions to types implementing `IEnumerable` #8034

PullRequests

Updated

  • Adjust dynamic binding rules for a situation of a single applicable candidate. #8027

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use of unassigned local variable #72974
  • Directory based AssemblyClassLoader appears to not do case insensitive directory name compare #72970
  • CheckForOverflowUnderflow causes casts from nint to void* to fail with an OverflowException when the nint is negative #72967
  • Bug: Field comments don't work with tabs. #72966
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0055 for comment on new line not indented to comments at end of previous line? #65247
  • Overloaded operators is not correctly colorized #71924
  • SyntaxGenerator crashes with 'checked' operators #63410
    Backlog
  • XAML files are part of a miscellaneous workspace rather than actual C# workspace #72959

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync project level info in parallel. #72976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sync small-sized information across all projects in one batch call. #72975
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Switch from an ImmutableDictionary to a FrozenDictionary/Array #72973
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.9] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #72969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #72968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review

Merged

  • Properly update workspace options when switching from FSA on to off #72971
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create service for copilot options #72972
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix notification handler tests to use per server task completion instances #72963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Free resources in a try/finally #72961
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Restore case insensitivity with file paths and related doc ids in the workspace #72965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove less individual sync calls to get compilation options. #72951
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions, extension methods or expanded non-array params cases. #72950
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have dynamic result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72964
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add a unit test to cover the unified setting's registration file. #72946
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rendering razor components outside of asp.net using HtmlRenderer ignores @layout directive #55068
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55067
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55066
  • Perf improvement: https #55065
  • HeadContent Append Mode #55064
  • Authentication for static files || OpenIDConnect || BlazoreServer App || Dotnetcore 8 #55057
  • Model binders cannot set a parameter to null if it has a non-null default value. #55056
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.4.24209.6] When launch the WorldExplorer homepage, it shows an error "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Security-Policy" #55054
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55053
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55052
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55051
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55050
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55049
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55048
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55047
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55046
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55045
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55044
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55043

Closed

  • Can't run Authentication Samples #53700
    Backlog
  • blazor.web.js suddenly broken 8.0.100 #55063
  • Blazor WASM .net 8: VS can not show variables in Locals or Immediate Window #55055
  • Notify Unhandled Circuit Exception #55027
  • Google OAuth Handler > Support full list of URI parameters #55058
  • Random NullReferenceException on HttpContext.User Kestrel/Outofprocess #54962

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware

Merged

  • Add support for generating OpenAPI parameters #55041
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Updated

  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24207.7 #55011
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • clru command in lldb fails to work #1907
    Future
  • dotnet trace not working for MAUI application using EF Core #4542
    9.0.0
  • Error: No CLR runtime found (dump collected with 8.0.0) #4563
    8.0.0
  • libsosplugin.dylib: CoreCLR host crash on macOS Sonoma 14.4 on arm64 #4551
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Followup 1ES template changes #4596

Merged

  • Update Alpine versions #4589
  • Merge main into release/stable #4594
  • Fix issue #4464 - dotnet-dump (and other tools) Access Denied when /tmp is R/O #4593
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issues fetching data during splash screen loading (deadlock) #21763
  • Setting MainPage in a unit test causes a null reference exception #21762
  • In Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 3 Project Properties do not open anymore #21758
  • XamlC Compilation errors when upgrading to Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.20 #21757
    .NET 8 SR4
  • .NET 9.0 Preview 2 Android part of MAUI do not compile #21755
  • Why not RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode="NearestNeighbor" like wpf? #21752
    Backlog
  • BlazorWebView: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirectory #21750
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Android Bug: NavigationPage as modal inside shell application, removes default page animation #21749
  • Unable to cache image Exception after version 8.0.9 #21748
    .NET 8 SR4
  • TemplateBinding with CornerRadius on Border does not work anymore #21747
    .NET 8 SR4
  • RoundRectangle on Grid Column set to Auto... Slowly stretches the Grid column #21746
    Backlog
  • After updating the latest version of the nuget package, the application cannot be compiled. #21744
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging #21741

Closed

  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21548
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException from FlexLayout.InitItemProperties #21711
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Firebase Messaging (FCM) is not working in Maui net8.0 #21730
  • Another - Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) (CS0246) #21751
  • Declared IsGestureEnabled = false but Flyout menu is still work on MAUI .NET8 Android #21522
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync on iOS scrolls also vertically when Orientation is horizontal but content view is smaller vertically than ScrollView #21537
  • Many Controls end up preventing Garbage Collection #19606
  • Border.StrokeShape is not currently being Garbage Collected #20668
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Resolving Trimming Warnings for `dotnet new maui` #19397
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming unfriendly usage of implicit operators through reflection #19922
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI iOS - DrawingView inside ScrollView does not draw. Attempted drawing trigger scrolling instead of drawing. (works fine on android) #21745
  • Android and iOS PlatformImage export/save all ImageFormats other than Jpeg as Png #14449
    Backlog
  • AppShell MenuItem doesn't work for Share functionality #20251
  • Hamburger menu is always enabled #21641

PullRequests

Created

  • Move CollectionViewItemsLayoutUpdate to appium #21767
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [ios/catalyst] avoid duplicating `UIView.Subviews` arrays #21765
  • [X] Fix TargetType simplification bug #21764
  • Use the path for determining the extension #21761
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21754
    community ✨
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨

Merged

  • Init the flex item before adding it to the layout #21737
    area/layout 🔲, layout-flex
  • Add .NET MAUI into the launch settings #21760
  • [Testing] Update Appium to RC7 #21720
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR4
  • Clarify PlatformImage supported image formats docs #21697
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529

Updated

  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Precompiled queries: take into account the NRT status of parameters introduced in query filters #33509
    Backlog
  • Precompiled queries: calculate the NRT status of complex expressions in the funcletizer #33508
    Backlog
  • dotnet ef scaffold with MySql.EntityFramworkCore provider doesn't generate .HasDefaultValue(0) #33506
  • Basic support for creating entities on partitioned tables in SQL Server (Code-First) #33505
    Backlog
  • Query generated when filtering against a nullable owned type property isn't correct #33504

Closed

  • does Entity Framework Core tools reference - .NET Core CLI support managed identity? #33464
  • Perf problem on existence checks caused by SqlClient's connection resiliency feature #7283
    5.0.0
  • Distributed transactions failures when running EF Core tests on main #29054
    9.0.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510

Merged

  • Remove CodeQL trigger for 2.1 #33502
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33503
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33500
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33501
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33499
